problem.problemDescription: You offer 5 good candidates, but 4 get rejected. These valuable candidates are lost because you can't place them elsewhere - pure capital destruction!

bureauRankings.title: Bureau Rankings
bureauRankings.subtitleBureau: See where you rank among all recruitment bureaus
bureauRankings.subtitleCompany: Find and compare top-performing recruitment bureaus
bureauRankings.accessDeniedMessage: This page is only accessible to bureaus and companies
bureauRankings.loginPrompt: Please log in to view bureau rankings

info.performanceScoreDesc: Composite score based on all key metrics

bureauRankings.improveDesc: Focus on: faster response times, higher candidate quality (acceptance rate), and successful placements (fill rate). Consistent performance across these metrics will boost your ranking.
bureauRankings.findBestDesc: Use these rankings to identify top-performing bureaus for your job distributions. Higher-tier bureaus typically deliver better results but may have higher fees. Consider your specific needs when selecting partners.

about.title: About Rankings
about.updatedDaily: Rankings are updated daily based on the latest performance data
about.weightedAlgo: Performance scores are calculated using a weighted algorithm
about.weights: Fill rate: 35%, Acceptance rate: 25%, Response rate: 20%, Speed: 20%
about.thresholdPlacements: New bureaus need at least 5 placements to move out of "NEW" tier
about.aggregationNote: Data is aggregated over the last 90 days for fair, recent performance representation

ratings.title: Ratings
ratings.tipMessage: Maintain a high rating by communicating professionally and meeting deadlines.
